title: Serious Rank 5's team  for competitive plays
body:
Hi guys I'm looking to start up a serious rank 5's team for competitive play, Plat+ only.
If you're interested let me know what champs you main and what lane do you main.

looking for similar like minded people who play to win every game they play not just for fun.

replies.body:
I'm a Gold IV, however I've played with numerous diamond ranked players and teams. I main Kat, Irelia, Yi, Rengar, Zed. However I can learn a champ on the spot if needed. Personally I prefer mid, however jungle and top are the roles I'll play outside of that.
I do play to win, and I will do what it takes for my team to win. All I'm looking for is to succeed with a group of people who I play with. A serious team is what I've been looking for.

So my details are:
IGN: WQLFY
Champs: Kat, Irelia, Yi, Rengar, Zed. (will use others if needed)
Position: mid (top/jungle)

Plat 5 adc main, Lucian/Corki/Graves/Caitlyn.

I strive to improve as much as I can as a player and take every game I play as some form of practice. Aiming to reach diamond next season hopefully. My way of having fun is winning, a serious team would be really cool to be apart of.
whats your in game name ? ill add you

Rank: Diamond 5
IGN: VoxeI (i at the end)
Role: ADC
Top Champs: Lucian, Corki, Twitch, Tristana, Jinx, Kog'maw.

Rank: Plat 4 (Highest Plat1)
IGN: Intero
Role: ADC
Top Champs: Lucian, Corki, Jinx, Graves, Ezreal, Trist
Been on teams for the past year or so, been to a few LAN's and value communication highly. Looking for a team to improve with and committed people who are motivated to learn.
Add me ingame for a chat :)
